name: Snowi The Snowman
description:
In this game you play as Snowi a little snowman who was granted a brain, created by a scientist, that allows him to move.

So that the scientist to know if his invention works, you will have to pass tests in a world based on winter.

This is my first game and i hope that you will enjoy it .

Controls :

Light arrow key : Right.

Left arrow key : Left.

Up arrow key / Space : Jump.

Enter / Left click : Ghanging the text of the dialog.
